name: OCI N.V. (FORMERLY KNOWN AS ORASCOM CONSTRUCTION INTERNATIONAL N.V.)
description: Fertilizer and ammonia producer, hydrogen plant
sampleDescriptions: Discussions regarding the potential railroad strike and its effects on the domestic fertilizer trade
